mapper.select:
SELECT fcm.car_id AS carId, cc.car_number AS carNumber, cc.car_vin AS carVin FROM flt_fleet_car_mapping fcm LEFT JOIN car cc ON cc.id = fcm.car_id WHERE fcm.team_id = #{teamId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
AND (cc.car_number LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') OR cc.car_vin LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
